author: Odeinoichus
title: It is NOT Peanut Butter Jelly Time
review:
Set #71013 Banana Guy: More food suits, first Hot Dog Guy and now Banana Guy.

Not much to discuss here, no prints on the legs or torso. He has double-molded arms for the short-sleeved look and his face has a big grinning smile with a pair of 'cool' shades on it. The new sculpted suit piece is brand new and looks great, it too features limited printing with a Banana sticker on it.

Overall this dude is set for some fun, a shame he didn't include an accessory to hold like a banana piece, however I'd suggest keeping this guy away from Gorilla Suit Guy, unless he wants to experience some unapeeling bad times. Heh... Strongly recommended.

author: bigbigdino
title: Best Minifigure In The Series.
review: This is the best minifigure in the series! It is a very funny design with a guy dressed up as a banana. Kids will love him.
